name: Dwarf Rush
description:
Dwarf Rush is a First Person spell slinging action game. This game was made as part of the UoP Gamejam 2022. 

The Cult of Rogur have taken the dwarves and are preparing to sacrifice them to bring back their Lord! Only you, Eric, have the power to stop them. Use your magic book and fireball spells to save your Dwarven friends by eliminating the cultists holding them!

Start your journey in the sewers and fight your way through the cultists. Defeat the ones casting spells to open the barrier to progress through the next area. Keep going until you save all the dwarves and escape the other side!

Music Created by Ashley Keep. 

How to play:

WASD - Move
Spacebar - Jump
Left Mouse Button - Fire a Fireball

Special Thanks:

Carlo Gregorio - Voice Actor
Ashley Keep - Composer 
Beth White - Needed a win/ Big help
Luis Venceslau - Formed a cult
Mitch's Mum and Dad - Always believing in him
